import React from "react"; import emailjs from "emailjs-com"; import { useForm } from "react-hook-form"; const Contacts = () => { const { register, handleSubmit, errors} = useForm(); const serviceID = "service_ID"; const templateID = "template_ID"; const userID = "user_8FLqdeLJXQM67fje6JxaQ"; function sendEmail(e) { e.preventDefault(); emailjs.sendForm(serviceID, templateID, e.target, userID ) .then((result) => { console.log(result.text); }, (error) => { console.log(error.text); }); } return (

) } export default Contacts
